Desc.entry: A registered charity which offers long-term psychoanalytic psychotherapy for individuals (aged 14 years and over) who have a variety of problems, including difficulties with relationships, depression and anxiety. Also offers couple, family and group therapy. Information pack includes an application form. Assessment appointment normally offered within 2 weeks of the application form being received. Costs for therapy sessions depend on individual annual incomes. Company limited by guarantee no 06757789. Self or any referral.
